item.title: How install SIPE (Office Communicator) with Pidgin Portable in Windows
item.description: You’ll need a portable folder of Pidgin 2.10+. By example: E:\PidginPortable. Copy all this files to that folder: E:\PidginPortable\App\Pidgin Manage your accounts, you’ll see the new Communicator Protocol :) Pidgin Portable with Office Communicator in Windows If you are using Ubuntu, just install the pidgin-sipe package from the Ubuntu Software Center :)
